text: ninnalute kuttattil tannalute bharyamare matakkalkk tulyamayi prakhyapikkunnavar (abad'dhamakunnu ceyyunnat‌.) avar (bharyamar) avarute matakkalalla. avarute matakkal avare prasavicca strikal allate marrarumalla. tirccayayum avar nisid'dhamaya vakkum asatyavuman parayunnat‌. tirccayayum allahu adhikam mappunalkunnavanum pearukkunnavanuman‌
